FOUND IN: Royal jelly - The exclusive secretion used as a primary source of nutrition for the queen bee and her developing larvae in a honeybee colony.
Croak (associated with sounds of frogs but can also be used metaphorically for human speech)
Patella - The actual name for knee-cap in anatomy and medical context.
Knight: Unlike other pieces, knights have a unique 'L'-shaped move which allows them to jump over others
